text: Drag My Dad is a television series streamed by MTV on Facebook Watch, starting in 2019. The show is hosted by Bob the Drag Queen, winner of season 8 of RuPaul’s Drag Race. The show features eight fathers who undergo drag makeovers and bond with their children in the process. ==References== Category:American LGBT-related web series Category:2019 web series debuts Category:Drag (clothing) television shows
title: Drag My Dad
